Room.Name: Wedding Chapel
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Holy Order of Corellon Larethian Wedding Chapel.
Room.LongDescription: Although this chapel is smaller than the main audience chamber outside, it is no less richly appointed. Unlike many other races, the elves have always been very rich, and enjoy showing their wealth in this, their shrine to Larethian. A canopy stands near a small altar of white marble, the place of honor for the bride and groom, and lush, indoor plants create a wonderful aroma of blooming flowers.
